main event: A low-flying object resembling a relay plane was observed from a boat in Harbor Avon, North Carolina on June 2, 1957.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 30 seconds,The object was reported at 2000 hours in clear weather,Partial report was not received,Indications of a possible aircraft but no definitive conclusions,The UFO investigation links to a series of sightings on March 9, 1957.
sighted object: low flying object that looked like a relay plane
